thread.section_title: Reid Cycles Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Reid Cycles | reidcycles.com.au
thread.title: Ocean

author: Ocean
title: Ocean
text: I am most grateful that a company still exists that makes kids products that adults also like! Reid was the only place we could find that made a girl's bike that wasn't covered in frozen characters, or tonnes of tacky overly girly cheap crap. My daughter loves it to bits, and it gets comments everywhere we go. This, and the excellent service, are why I have been recommending Reid to everyone who asks about her bike - which is pretty much everyone :)
